Our Products

We offer high grade soapstone lumps and Soapstone (Talc) Powder. Soapstone offered by us are of superior quality and high in demand. 

Contact Us

Different Grades of Soapstone Powder

Talc powder is an ideal carrier and functional extender in cosmetics and pharmaceuticals. Further applications include high performance paints and coatings, thermoplastic polymers, waxes, and slip agents.

Learn More

Different Grades of Soapstone Lumps

Talc is the world’s softest and most hydrophobic mineral. It adds new features to products that use it as a raw material and makes processes more efficient. It’s salient features help it act as the most effective filler material.

Learn More
why to choose ?

Why To Choose Us

Talc is used as a filler, coating, pigment, dusting agent and extender in plastics, ceramics, paint, paper, cosmetics, roofing, rubber and many other products.

High Grade Soapstone

Products offered by us are from our self-owned mines .

Timely Delivery

Company utmost priority is timely delivery.

Ethical Business Practice

We conducts its business with trust and transparency

Brightness (95.6%-99%)

High grade talc ore renowned for its quality and brightness

Low Calcium Max upto 0.5%

Calcium ranges from 0.25% to 0.50%

Impurity Free Product

Soapstone product are free from any impurity.

Usages

Talc Powder Applications

Talc, or talcum, is a clay mineral composed of hydrated magnesium silicate, with the chemical formula Mg 3Si 4O 10(OH) 2.

  • PHARMACEUTICALS
  • COSMETICS
  • FOODS
  • PAPER
